thread.title: Famous Movie Images Before & After Visual Effects
thread.title_full: Famous Movie Images Before & After Visual Effects

author: Kofi Outlaw
title: Famous Movie Images Before & After Visual Effects
text:
Famous Movie Images Before & After Visual Effects Kofi Outlaw Start Photo Gallery Back to Article Image of 
Audiences love to be put under the spell of movie magic while they're sitting in the theaer, watching worlds, characters and creatures come alive onscreen.At the same time, modern audiences are all too aware of visual effects work in movies, with even recent releases like Rogue One: A Star Wars Story prompting the debate about whether or not filmmakers' lofty ambitions can be realized with CGI effects. 
More often than not, though, visual effects work passes the test of your eye in ways you didn't even realize - case in point: this new gallery of movie images that provide behind-the-scenes insights about how a shot looked before the visual effects were added - versus the what the final shot looked like onscreen. 
The movies in the gallery include: Guardians of the Galaxy
